channel.title: Comments on: YellIfItChanges Scratches a Common Itch

item.title: By: Paul O Mahony
item.dc:creator: Paul O Mahony
item.description: Oh, I see the input boxes now. Note on my laptop, if the plane of the screen is slightly off perpendicular, the outline of the input boxes become invisible (on flock at least).
item.content:encoded: Oh, I see the input boxes now. Note on my laptop, if the plane of the screen is slightly off perpendicular, the outline of the input boxes become invisible (on flock at least).

item.title: By: Paul O Mahony
item.dc:creator: Paul O Mahony
item.description: Looks interesting, but I can't figure out where to register? Is it closed beta?
item.content:encoded: Looks interesting, but I can’t figure out where to register? Is it closed beta?
